question: Posted By don on March 10, 1999 at 01:00:01:In Reply to: Frequent Urination & Burning Sensation posted by Scott on March 09, 1999 at 16:17:27:Sounds like diabetes insipidus.  I don't mean sugar diabetes,which is also a possibility.  Diabetes insipidus is a lack ofthe hormone vasopressin which tells the body how to regulateits water.The question is: if you don't drink any water for a whole day,do you still urinate a lot.  If so, its diabetes insipidus.Your doctor can test for vasopressin in your blood.
title: Re: Frequent Urination & Burning Sensation
